detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract BDB (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#314-395) has payable functions:
	 - BDB.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#392-394)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [BDB](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#L314-L395) has payable functions:
	 - [BDB.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#L392-L394)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:
TokenLock.addTokenLock(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#297-304) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(_value >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#299)

TokenLock.getMinLockedAmount(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#255-277) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockState.latestReleaseTime < now (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#263)
	- t > now (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BDB.sol#271)
